Entities.Name: Observation
Entities.Definition: Specific terms representing abnormal features in radiology images, such as lesions and opacities.

Entities.Name: Clinical finding
Entities.Definition: Terms that express diagnoses or suspected conditions, typically interpreted from observation entities by radiologists.

Entities.Name: Anatomical location modifier
Entities.Definition: Locations or anatomical descriptors related to observations or findings.

Entities.Name: Certainty modifier
Entities.Definition: Modifiers that describe the degree of certainty regarding the observation or finding.

Entities.Name: Change modifier
Entities.Definition: Terms indicating temporal progression or status change of a finding.

Entities.Name: Characteristics modifier
Entities.Definition: Modifiers that describe shape, texture, or other qualities of an observation.

Entities.Name: Size modifier
Entities.Definition: Quantitative descriptors of size for clinical observations.

Dataset.Name: Osaka University Hospital Chest CT Report Corpus
Dataset.Description: 540 annotated Japanese chest CT radiology reports from Osaka University Hospital. Used for training and evaluating NER models, with external validation on 77 reports from Osaka International Cancer Institute.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Three medical experts annotated each report using an in-house guideline based on RadLex terminology. Entities were labeled using IOB2 format in the TALEN annotation tool. Disagreements were resolved by majority vote and adjudicated by a clinician.
